channel.title: CVE Feed for HackerOne -- elding node module
channel.description: The latest CVEs for HackerOne -- elding node module

item.title: CVE-2017-16222|2024-08-05T20:20:05.524Z -- hackerone -- elding%20node%20module
item.description: elding is a simple web server. elding is vulnerable to a directory traversal issue, allowing an attacker to access the filesystem by placing "../" in the url. The files accessible, however, are limited to files with a file extension. Sending a GET request to /../../../etc/passwd, for example, will return a 404 on etc/passwd/index.js.
